title: Pixel 3 can't connect to 5ghz wifi
content:
My pixel 3 was able to connect to my wifi 5ghz router. However, it suddenly disconnect since two weeks ago and now keep showing "connecting" and then "Saved" when I try to connect it.

All other devices are still working fine with the 5ghz including iPhone, iPad, XPS laptop. 

I tried reset the wifi setting and factory reset for both pixel 3 and router, it doesn't help. 

My pixel 3 can still see the 5ghz signal but keep showing "connecting" and then "Saved" when I tried to connecting. 

Any suggestion here?
